import numpy as np # linear algebra
import pandas as pd # data processing, CSV file I/O (e.g. pd.read_csv)

# Input data files are available in the read-only "../input/" directory
# For example, running this (by clicking run or pressing Shift+Enter) will list all files under the input directory

import os
for dirname, _, filenames in os.walk('/kaggle/input'):
    for filename in filenames:
        print(os.path.join(dirname, filename))

import pandas as pd
import numpy as np

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns
%matplotlib inline

plt.style.use('tableau-colorblind10')

import plotly.express as px
import warnings
warnings.simplefilter("ignore")
source.cbda80e5: data1.rename(columns={col:col.replace(' ', '') for col in data1.columns}, inplace=True)
source.f167d983:
# Total Positive and Recovered cases by Districts.

df = new_df.loc[:, ['Districts', 'PositiveCases', 'Recovered']]
df.set_index('Districts', inplace=True)

df.plot(kind='bar', figsize=(14, 8), color=['#54436B', '#50CB93'])

plt.title("Total Positive & Recovered Cases in Districts of Maharashtra.")

plt.xticks(rotation=90)
plt.legend()

plt.show()
source.de68139c:
plt.figure(figsize=(14, 8))

sns.barplot(x='Districts', y="ActiveCases", color="red", label="Active", data = new_df)

plt.title("Total Active Cases.")

plt.xticks(rotation=90)
plt.legend()

plt.show()
source.c08ec12b:

plt.title("Total Number of Deceased.")

plt.xticks(rotation=90)
plt.legend()

plt.show()

source.9add335a:
avg_recovery_rate = round(data1['RecoveryRate(%)'].mean(), 2)
avg_fatality_rate = round(data1['FatalityRate(%)'].mean(), 2)
col = ['RecoveryRate', 'FatalityRate']

plt.figure(figsize=(10, 8))
plt.pie([avg_recovery_rate,avg_fatality_rate], labels=col, explode=[0.1, 0], autopct="%0.2f")

plt.title('Average Recovery and Fatality Rates in Maharashtra')
plt.show()

fig = px.bar(data2.sort_values("Positive Cases"),x='Districts',y='Positive Cases',color = 'Fatality Rate (%)',template="simple_white")

source.9ab70763:
fig = px.sunburst(data2, path=['Districts'], values='Deceased',
                  color_continuous_scale='RdBu')
fig.update_layout(
    margin = dict(t=10, l=10, r=10, b=10)
)
fig.show()
source.27f8a99e:
fig = px.bar_polar(data2, r="Recovered", theta="Districts",
                   color="Recovery Rate (%)", template="plotly_dark",
                   color_discrete_sequence= px.colors.sequential.Plasma_r)

fig.update_layout(
    title='RECOVERY OF PATIENTS IN MAHARASHTRA',
    font_size=12,
    legend_font_size=12,
    polar_angularaxis_rotation=45,

)
fig.show()
